Singing, Cursing and Delivering a Performance to Devastatingly Critical Acclaim PvM (1-40) and PvP

WAR BARD
By Deborah “Tyr” Templar
Author’s Note: This build, the War Bard ("Battle Crier") was first published in the ECB on July 9, 2007, and has been revisited in light of 1.69. The focus of this build is to provide a Lasting Inspirational SINGER for team-play (PvP) who is also a Bard-TANK; enjoying among other things over 500 HPs (about 600 raging), DR 12/- , with wonderful skills and saves across the board (especially v spells), a really nice defense (including impr.invis/SC-5), full access Bard spells and a high AB [47 Singing ONLY (40 +2 Song/+5 Curse) / buffed: 58+6 Taunt: 64 (self-buffs only)], this master maestro is more than capable of taking care of him/herself, and also shines in toe-to-toe melee combat, etc., thus playable 1-40 PvM/E, too. The original build can be seen here: http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 78296.html (with links therein to other combos). What follows is the build (dev.crit and non-dev.crit path included).
True, This! —
Beneath the rule of men entirely great
The (Song) is mightier than the sword. Behold!
~ Edward Bulwer-Lytton, "Richelieu: the Conspiracy." (London: 1839)

War Bard,
Bard(26), Red Dragon Disciple(10), Barbarian(4)

I. Attributes:
STR: 16 (30)
DEX: 8
CON: 15 (21)
WIS: 8
INT: 14 (16)
CHA: 14 (16)

Human, Non-Lawful

II. Level Guide:
01: Barbarian(1): weapon focus, power attack
02: Bard(1)
03: Bard(2): Cleave (If uninterested in dev.crit, then: still spell)*
04: Bard(3): STR+1, (STR=17)
05: Bard(4)
06: Red Dragon Disciple(1): knockdown
07: Red Dragon Disciple(2): (STR=19)
08: Red Dragon Disciple(3): STR+1, (STR=20)
09: Red Dragon Disciple(4): blind fight, (STR=22)
10: Red Dragon Disciple(5)
11: Red Dragon Disciple(6)
12: Red Dragon Disciple(7): STR+1, improved critical, (STR=23), (CON=17)
13: Red Dragon Disciple(8)
14: Barbarian(2): {Uncanny Dodge I}
15: Barbarian(3): great cleave (Or, Empower Spell if no Dev.Crit)*
16: Barbarian(4): STR+1, (STR=24)
17: Bard(5)
18: Bard(6): curse song
19: Bard(7)
20: Bard(8): CON+1, (CON=18)
21: Red Dragon Disciple(9): epic weapon focus, (INT=16)
22: Red Dragon Disciple(10): {Darkvision}, (STR=28), (CHA=16)
23: Bard(9)
24: Bard(10): CON+1, overwhelming critical (If no Dev.Crit: IKD or Epic Reflexes)* (CON=19)
25: Bard(11)
26: Bard(12)
27: Bard(13): devastating critical (If no Dev.Crit: Craft Wand or Armor Skin)*
28: Bard(14): CON+1, (CON=20)
29: Bard(15)
30: Bard(16): epic prowess
31: Bard(17)
32: Bard(18): CON+1, (CON=21)
33: Bard(19): epic damage reduction I
34: Bard(20)
35: Bard(21)
36: Bard(22): STR+1, epic damage reduction II, (STR=29)
37: Bard(23): lasting inspiration
38: Bard(24)
39: Bard(25): epic damage reduction III
40: Bard(26): STR+1, epic skill focus: perform, (STR=30)

Dev.Crit Note—Alternate: If for some reason not interested in Dev.Crit and/or it’s banned on your world, then might I recommend meta-magics pre-epic (i.e., Still and Empower Spell) instead of Cleave and Grt.Cleave, and two of the following (instead of OC and DC) in epics: IKD, Craft Wand, Armor Skin and/or Epic Reflexes, as you prefer, in lieu of Dev.Crit.

---

III. Basics:
Hitpoints: 488 (518 Singing / 598 Raging)

Saving Throws (Buffed) [v. Spells]
Fort: 27 (34) [44]
Will: 22 (32) [42]
Reflex: 18 (25) [35]

Saving Throw bonuses: Spells: +8 / +10 Singing (included in above calculations)
Other: Bard Spells (Clarity, Impr.Invis (SC-5) , Etc.); RDD Immunities (Fire, Paralysis).

[+1 Resistance, +2 Circle v Alignment, Song (+2 Fort, +3 Will, +2 Reflex), Rage (+2 Fort, +2 Will), Owl’s, Cat’s Grace]

IV. Combat Vitals:
a. Devastating Critical (DC): 40, +2 Bull’s, +2 Rage: 44, +2 Curse: DC 46

b. Attack Bonus (AB):
BAB: 26, AB (naked): 40, +2 Song, +5 Curse: 47 (singing only)
Self-Buffed: AB 58, +6 Taunt: 64, Or: 64/59/54/49/64

(+2 War Cry, +2 Bull’s, +2 Rage, +5 Greater Magic Weapon, Haste)

c. Damage—Comparative:
*Mundane Scimitar: 1-6+10, +3 Song, Or: 1-6+13 (crit: 15-20/x2)
Self-Buffed Damage: 1-6+29 (crit: 12-20/x2)

*Mundane Greatsword: 2-12+15+3 Song, or: 2-12+18 (17-20/x2)
Self-Buffed Damage: 2-12+36 (crit: 15-20/x2)

Other: Bard Spells [Ultravision/Darkness; Grt.Dispel; Bard Ice; Etc.]; Curse Song (34 damage)

[+2 War Cry, +2-3 Bull’s, +2-3 Rage, +5 GMW, Keen Edge, +5 Power Attack (-5 ab)]


V. Defense Vitals (AC):

a. Damage Reduction (Curse + EDR3): DR 12/-

b. AC (Naked) 21, +3 studded leather, +7 Song/Curse, +3 tower: 34*(-2 raging)
Self-Buffed (AC): 42, +3 mundane shield: 45, hasted and SC-5 (impr.invis) (-2 raging)

*Note: add +2 if wearing Medium Armor instead, or: AC 36 (song/curse only) / 47 Buffed
Other: Bard Spells (Ultravision/Darkness; Grt.Dispel); Bard Ice; Bard Summons; Dev.Crit.

[+4 Haste, +5 Mage Armor and Circle v Alignment, +2 Cat’s, Impr.Invis (50% Concealment)]


VI. Bard Song/Curse Song:
a. Bard Song, Level 21 (55 Perform):
+2 AB/+3 Damage; Saving Throws (+3 Will, +2 Fort, +2 Reflex), +5 AC, +9 Skills, +30 HPs.

b. Curse Song, Level 23 (56+9 Song: 65 Perform)
Opposite effect on all enemies, namely: -2 AB/-3 damage, -5 AC, reduced saves (-2 Fort, -3 Will, -2 Reflex), -34 HPs, -11 skills.


VII. Spell Casting: Bard(6), 26+1d20
Cantrips: 5/4 Level 1: 5/5 Level 2: 5/5 Level 3: 5/5 Level 4: 5/4 Level 5: 5/4 Level 6: 4/4
To see your good book, click: http://nwn.wikia.com/wiki/Bard

* Note: Bard entitles use of arcane items, scrolls, and of course bard toys (instruments, etc.).


VIII. Skillpoints: 300*
Concentration 42(47), Discipline 43(53), Listen 43(42), Lore 8(37), Perform 43(56), Spellcraft 38(41), Taunt 43(46), Tumble 40(39)

Buffed Skills--Adjusted (Self-Buffs ONLY, no magic equipment/gear):

i) Concentration 47, +20 Song/Curse: 67, +2 Rage: 69 (trying to taunt you are they? Seriously?! Don’t they know that dragons, even half-drakes, don’t take kindly to being disturbed?! )

ii)Taunt 46, +20 Song/Curse, +2 Eagle’s: 68 (to effectively taunt them, heh)

iii) Listen 42, +20 Song/Curse, +20 amplify, +10 clairaud/voyance, +2 Owl’s: 94 (a “sneaker” trying to make off with your gold, really? Don’t think so!

iv) Discipline 53, +9 Song, +2 Bull’s, +2 Rage, +2 Curse: 68, +SC-5 (impr.invis) (trying to down a “dragon” are they, or rip off (disarm) your “claw”? Hmpf. Meantime, as against your KD, etc. and Dev.Crit DC 46, … Foolish mortals.

What’s not to love about the bard?!! ~ Enjoy.

*Players are of course free to adjust their War Bard to suit their own needs/environs, as always.
